snippet: Stocks fell in afternoon trading after the release of a mixed report on the U.S. job market and news that Greek finances were deteriorating.
abstract: Markets end with slight losses as investors seek safety ahead of July 4th weekend.
lead_paragraph: Stocks fell in afternoon trading after the release of a mixed report on the U.S. job market and news that Greek finances were deteriorating.

headline.main: Market Mixed on Jobs Data and Greece’s Decline
headline.print_headline: Markets Slip as Wall St. Ends Its Worst Week in 3 Months
